information: The company FRANZ HOELTER LEICHTMETALLWERKSTAETTE GMBH & CO. KG, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, which operates in the Steel industry. It also operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron, Aluminium and aluminium alloys, Foundries, aluminium, and Metals, precious and special industries. It is based in Sundern, Germany.
